assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Dr. Kevin S. Hughes receives honoraria from Hologic (Surgical implant for radiation planning with breast conservation and wire-free breast biopsy), TME (Targeted Medical Education, genetics education and consulting), MedNeon (Genetics education company), and Myriad Genetics. Dr. Hughes has a financial interest in CRA Health (Formerly Hughes RiskApps) which was recently acquired by Volpara. CRA Health develops risk assessment models/software with a particular focus on breast cancer and colorectal cancer. Dr. Hughes is the founder of the company. Dr. Hughes is the Co-Creator of Ask2Me.Org which is freely available for clinical use and is licensed for commercial use by the Dana Farber Cancer Institute and the Massachusetts General Hospital. Dr. Hughes’s interests in CRA Health and Ask2Me.Org were reviewed and are managed by Massachusetts General Hospital and Partners Health Care in accordance with their conflict-of-interest policies. The other authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This project was a quality improvement project following the Standards for Quality Improvement Reporting Excellence (SQUIRE) reporting guideline and therefore was exempt from Institutional Review Board approval.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
